name: Lover
description:
Lover is a first-person psychological horror game.
Presented in a nostalgic and retro environment, player will uncover the cause of the illness through reincarnation and overcome psychological issues.
Before darkness consumes your world, find those unspeakable secrets as you face the cold house and shattered reality.

Story

A complex relationship, a dark secret, a moment of confusion leading to a deadly outcome.

Environment

Presented in a nostalgic and retro environment with a minimalist interface to provide the most authentic and immersive experience.

Features

Under the player's mental illness, losing sanity will lead to death, but there are still ways to avoid it.
Before losing your sanity, make use of your time to piece together the story, find reasonable answers,
and stay away from any enemies attempting to take your life.
